# Wave Power Table (1-120)

Base points: Runner=1, Tank=2.8, Siphon=2.4, Boss=14
Scaling weights: HP=0.55, Armor=0.15, MR=0.15, Speed=0.15
Boss HP rule: On boss waves, boss HP uses previous wave total non-boss HP (same as game logic).
